description.value:
Normal effect

The ship gains a +2 enhancement bonus to its speed for 1 turn, and the piloting check made in the Helm phase to determine the order of movement of starships gains a +2 enhancement bonus, but all other piloting checks made that turn take a –5 penalty.

Requires the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.esc4GLvaX3Qd3CUs]{Recalibrate Engine} mechanic trick.
